name: Construction PX 2016
description:
Construction PX 2016 is an game! Heavy controllable digger machinery like crane, bulldozer, forklift and excavator and construction trucks are used to construct and build tall tower buildings.

It is a puzzle game where you will entertained with puzzle games, block game and memo game. This game is suitable for all age, and it also good for children education.

How to play

  • Puzzle game: Tap to randomize tiles and recreate back the image
  • Block game: Change or rotate the block to fit
  • Memo game: Tap to find the same image

    • Go on, download Construction PX 2016 and take this puzzle game challenge now!
